extension.description: This script plays random items from various types of lists. Generally works on TV Shows and Movies, file systems, and some playlists. Music and some other unhandled cases still to come. Search/Filter from the left hand side seems unlikely/precarious.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on does not add functionality on its own and must be supported by skins or other add-ons. Try the Context item 'Play Random Items' add-on!
